name: Discover 'THE OLD QUATER' (Hoan Kiem) and Hanoi Exotic Food
description:
Do you want to discover "King Ly Thai To", "Ngoc Son Temple", "Sword Lake and Turtle Tower"? Do you want to enjoy Hanoi Exotic Food, especially Street Food? If your answer is YES. Congrats! I am the right person who can give you responses.

Our trip is from 8.00 am to 5.00 pm

Let's go!
